name: Worm Wigs!
description:
You're just a worm that wants to wear a wig, babey!!!

Use WASD to move, just bump into things to interact. It's more of an experience than a game, but it's cute n' fun nonetheless!

(Game made using Bitsy game maker, for a mini-jam in one of my classes! We had about 2 hours to make either art or a game, following the theme of "Cool Bugs".)
